articles.author: Apollo Heyes
articles.title: Spalletti loses patience with Jorginho in Italy loss: ‘No point in him playing’ - Football Italia
articles.description: Italy coach Luciano Spalletti exploded with frustration at Jorginho during the first half of the Euro 2024 loss to Spain, suggesting there was ‘no...
articles.content:
Italy coach Luciano Spalletti exploded with frustration at Jorginho during the first half of the Euro 2024 loss to Spain, suggesting there was no point in him playing.
The Azzurri failed to impress … [+871 chars]
